title: Software Engineer
description: Designs, builds, and maintains software systems and applications.
education: BSc in Computer Science or related field

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyzes data to inform business decisions and strategies.
education: BSc in Statistics, Business, or related

title: Registered Nurse
description: Provides patient care and supports medical teams in healthcare settings.
education: Nursing degree and license

title: Doctor
description: Diagnoses and treats medical conditions, provides patient care.
education: Medical degree (MD/MBBS) and residency

title: Web Developer
description: Creates and maintains websites and web applications.
education: BSc in Computer Science or bootcamp

title: Marketing Manager
description: Develops and executes marketing strategies to promote products/services.
education: BSc in Marketing, Business, or related

title: Mechanical Engineer
description: Designs and develops mechanical systems and machinery.
education: BSc in Mechanical Engineering

title: Graphic Designer
description: Creates visual concepts and designs for various media.
education: BFA in Graphic Design or related

title: Cybersecurity Specialist
description: Protects computer systems and networks from cyber threats.
education: BSc in Cybersecurity or Computer Science

title: Business Analyst
description: Analyzes business processes and recommends improvements.
education: BSc in Business, Economics, or related

title: Civil Engineer
description: Designs and supervises construction of infrastructure projects.
education: BSc in Civil Engineering

title: Pharmacist
description: Dispenses medications and provides pharmaceutical care.
education: PharmD degree and license

title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Develops artificial intelligence and machine learning solutions.
education: BSc/MSc in Computer Science, AI, or related

title: Financial Advisor
description: Provides financial planning and investment advice to clients.
education: BSc in Finance, Economics, or related + certifications

title: Electrical Engineer
description: Designs and develops electrical systems and equipment.
education: BSc in Electrical Engineering

title: Photographer
description: Captures and creates visual images for various purposes.
education: BFA in Photography or self-taught

title: Project Manager
description: Plans and oversees projects from start to finish.
education: BSc in Business, Engineering, or related + PMP certification

title: Environmental Engineer
description: Develops solutions to environmental problems and sustainability.
education: BSc in Environmental Engineering or related

title: Animator
description: Creates animated content for films, games, and digital media.
education: BFA in Animation or related

title: Physical Therapist
description: Helps patients recover from injuries and improve mobility.
education: Doctor of Physical Therapy (DPT) degree
